trans-unit.source: Controls rights to make or accept connections on a transport address.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer rettigheter til å gjøre eller godta tilkoblinger på en Transportadresse.

trans-unit.source: SocketPermission instances control permission to accept connections or initiate <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> connections.
trans-unit.target: SocketPermission forekomster kontrollere tillatelse til å godta tilkoblinger eller starte <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>tilkoblinger.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> permission can be established for a host name or IP address, a port number, and a transport protocol.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>tillatelse kan opprette for et vertsnavn eller IP-adresse, et portnummer og en transportprotokollen.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Avoid creating socket permissions using host names, as these names have to be resolved to IP addresses, and this might block the stack.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Unngå å opprette socket-tillatelser ved hjelp av vertsnavn, disse navnene må løses til IP-adresser, og dette kan forhindre stakken.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"></xref> class that allows unrestricted access to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> or disallows access to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"> </xref> klassen som tillater ubegrenset tilgang til <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>eller tillater ikke tilgang til <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.SocketPermission> instance is created with the `Unrestricted` value from <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> then the <xref:System.Net.SocketPermission> instance passes all demands.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Net.SocketPermission>forekomst opprettes med den `Unrestricted` verdi fra <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>vil <xref:System.Net.SocketPermission>forekomsten sender alle behovene.</xref:System.Net.SocketPermission> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Net.SocketPermission>

trans-unit.source: Any other value for `state` results in a <xref:System.Net.SocketPermission> instance that fails all demands unless a transport address permission is added with <xref:System.Net.SocketPermission.AddPermission%2A>.
trans-unit.target: En annen verdi for `state` fører til en <xref:System.Net.SocketPermission>forekomst som mislykkes alle kravene med mindre en transport for postadressen tillatelse er lagt til med <xref:System.Net.SocketPermission.AddPermission%2A>.</xref:System.Net.SocketPermission.AddPermission%2A> </xref:System.Net.SocketPermission>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"></xref> class for the given transport address with the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"> </xref> klasse for den angitte transportadressen med den angitte tillatelsen.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a <xref:System.Net.SocketPermission> that controls access to the specified `hostName` and `portNumber` using the specified `transport`.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren oppretter en <xref:System.Net.SocketPermission>som styrer tilgang til den angitte `hostName` og `portNumber` ved hjelp av den angitte `transport`.</xref:System.Net.SocketPermission>

trans-unit.source: The `hostName` can be a DNS name, an IP address, or a specified IP subnet, such as 192.168.1.*.
trans-unit.target: Den `hostName` kan være et DNS-navn, en IP-adresse eller en bestemt IP-adressedelnett, for eksempel 192.168.1.*.

trans-unit.source: The `portNumber` can be any valid port number defined by the transport, or <xref:System.Net.SocketPermission.AllPorts?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Den `portNumber` kan være et gyldig portnummer definert av transport eller <xref:System.Net.SocketPermission.AllPorts?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Net.SocketPermission.AllPorts?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Net.NetworkAccess"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Net.NetworkAccess"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Net.TransportType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Net.TransportType"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The host name for the transport address.
trans-unit.target: Vertsnavnet for Transportadresse.

trans-unit.source: The port number for the transport address.
trans-unit.target: Portnummeret for Transportadresse.

trans-unit.source: hostName is .
trans-unit.target: hostNameis .

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of <xref href="System.Net.EndpointPermission"></xref> instances that identifies the endpoints that can be accepted under this permission instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter en liste over <xref href="System.Net.EndpointPermission"> </xref> forekomster som identifiserer endepunkt godtas under denne tillatelsen-forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: An instance that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface that contains <xref href="System.Net.EndpointPermission"></xref> instances.
trans-unit.target: En forekomst som implementerer i <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>grensesnitt som inneholder <xref href="System.Net.EndpointPermission"> </xref> forekomster.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Adds a permission to the set of permissions for a transport address.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en tillatelse i sett med tillatelser for en Transportadresse.

trans-unit.source: The `hostName` can be a DNS name, an IP address, or a specified IP subnet, such as 192.168.1.*.
trans-unit.target: Den `hostName` kan være et DNS-navn, en IP-adresse eller en bestemt IP-adressedelnett, for eksempel 192.168.1.*.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Net.NetworkAccess"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Net.NetworkAccess"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Net.TransportType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Net.TransportType"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The host name for the transport address.
trans-unit.target: Vertsnavnet for Transportadresse.

trans-unit.source: The port number for the transport address.
trans-unit.target: Portnummeret for Transportadresse.

trans-unit.source: hostName is .
trans-unit.target: hostNameis .

trans-unit.source: Defines a constant that represents all ports.
trans-unit.target: Definerer en konstant som representerer alle porter.

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Dette feltet er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: The value of this field is -1.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for dette feltet er -1.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of <xref href="System.Net.EndpointPermission"></xref> instances that identifies the endpoints that can be connected to under this permission instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter en liste over <xref href="System.Net.EndpointPermission"> </xref> forekomster som identifiserer endepunkt som kan kobles til under denne tillatelsen-forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: An instance that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface that contains <xref href="System.Net.EndpointPermission"></xref> instances.
trans-unit.target: En forekomst som implementerer i <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>grensesnitt som inneholder <xref href="System.Net.EndpointPermission"> </xref> forekomster.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of a <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kopi av en <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The object returned by this method represents the same level of access as the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som returneres av denne metoden representerer samme tilgangsnivået som gjeldende forekomst.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Copy%2A> and is implemented to support the <xref:System.Security.IPermission> interface.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden overstyrer <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Copy%2A>og er implementert for å støtte av <xref:System.Security.IPermission>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Security.IPermission> </xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Copy%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"></xref> class that is a copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: En ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"> </xref> klasse som er en kopi av den gjeldende forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"></xref> instance for an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: Rekonstruerer en <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"> </xref> forekomsten for XML-koding.

trans-unit.source: The FromXml method reconstructs a <xref:System.Net.SocketPermission> instance from an XML encoding defined by the <xref:System.Security.SecurityElement> class.
trans-unit.target: Metoden FromXml Rekonstruerer en <xref:System.Net.SocketPermission>forekomsten fra XML-koding er definert av <xref:System.Security.SecurityElement>klasse.</xref:System.Security.SecurityElement> </xref:System.Net.SocketPermission>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.SocketPermission.ToXml%2A> method to encode the <xref:System.Net.SocketPermission> instance, including state information, in XML.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Net.SocketPermission.ToXml%2A>metode for å kryptere den <xref:System.Net.SocketPermission>forekomsten, inkludert status, i XML.</xref:System.Net.SocketPermission> </xref:System.Net.SocketPermission.ToXml%2A>

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding used to reconstruct the <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: XML-kodingen som brukes til Bygg opp den <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The securityElement is .
trans-unit.target: The securityElement is .

trans-unit.source: The securityElement is not a permission element for this type.
trans-unit.target: Den securityElement er ikke et tillatelseselement for denne typen.

trans-unit.source: Returns the logical intersection between two <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"></xref> instances.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer det logiske skjæringspunktet mellom to <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"> </xref> forekomster.

trans-unit.source: The intersection of two permissions is a permission that helps to protect the resources and operations protected by both permissions.
trans-unit.target: Skjæringspunktet mellom to tillatelsene er en tillatelse som beskytter ressurser og operasjoner som er beskyttet av både.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it represents the minimum permission such that any demand that passes both permissions also passes their intersection.
trans-unit.target: Spesielt, representerer den minimum tillatelsen slik at alle behov som sender både sender også skjæringspunktet.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Intersect%2A> and is implemented to support the <xref:System.Security.IPermission> interface.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden overstyrer <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Intersect%2A>og er implementert for å støtte av <xref:System.Security.IPermission>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Security.IPermission> </xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Intersect%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"></xref> instance to intersect with the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"> </xref> forekomsten til intersect med den gjeldende forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"></xref> instance that represents the intersection of two <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"></xref> instances.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"> </xref> -forekomst som representerer skjæringspunktet mellom to <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"> </xref> forekomster.

trans-unit.source: If the intersection is empty, the method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis skjæringspunktet er tom, returneres <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the target parameter is a null reference, the method returns .
trans-unit.target: Hvis den target parameteren er en null-referanse, returneres .

trans-unit.source: The target parameter is not a .
trans-unit.target: The target parameter is not a .

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"></xref> is not granted to the method caller.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"></xref>er ikke gitt til metoden anroperen.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: Avgjør om gjeldende tillatelsen er et delsett av den angitte tillatelsen.

trans-unit.source: The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende tillatelsen er et delsett av den angitte tillatelsen hvis gjeldende tillatelsen angir et sett med operasjoner som helt finnes i den angitte tillatelsen.

trans-unit.source: For example, a permission that represents access to 192.168.1.1:80 is a subset of a permission that represents access to 192.168.1.1:Any.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel er en tillatelse som representerer tilgang til 192.168.1.1:80 et delsett for en tillatelse som representerer tilgang til 192.168.1.1:Any.

trans-unit.source: If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne metoden returnerer `true`, gjeldende tillatelsen representerer ingen flere tilgang til beskyttet ressurs enn den angitte tillatelsen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"></xref> that is to be tested for the subset relationship.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"> </xref> som skal testes for delsett-relasjonen.

trans-unit.source: If target is , this method returns if the current instance defines no permissions; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Hvis target er , metoden returnerer Hvis gjeldende forekomst definerer ingen tillatelser; ellers .

trans-unit.source: If target is not , this method returns if the current instance defines a subset of target permissions; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Hvis target er ikke , metoden returnerer Hvis gjeldende forekomst definerer et delsett av target tillatelser; ellers .

trans-unit.source: target is not a .
trans-unit.target: targeter ikke en .

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"></xref> is not granted to the method caller.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.DnsPermission"></xref>er ikke gitt til metoden anroperen.

trans-unit.source: Checks the overall permission state of the object.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer tilstanden for den totale tillatelse for objektet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"></xref> instance is created with the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Unrestricted" name="Unrestricted" href=""></xref> value from <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"> </xref> forekomst opprettes med den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Unrestricted" name="Unrestricted" href=""> </xref> verdi fra <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of a <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"></xref> instance and its current state.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en XML-kodingen for en <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"> </xref> forekomsten og den gjeldende tilstanden.

trans-unit.source: The ToXml method creates a <xref:System.Security.SecurityElement> instance to encode a representation of the <xref:System.Net.SocketPermission> instance, including state information, in XML.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ToXml oppretter en <xref:System.Security.SecurityElement>forekomsten til kode en representasjon av den <xref:System.Net.SocketPermission>forekomsten, inkludert status, i XML.</xref:System.Net.SocketPermission> </xref:System.Security.SecurityElement>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.SocketPermission.FromXml%2A> method to restore the state information from a <xref:System.Security.SecurityElement> instance.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Net.SocketPermission.FromXml%2A>metode for å gjenopprette statusinformasjon fra en <xref:System.Security.SecurityElement>forekomsten.</xref:System.Security.SecurityElement> </xref:System.Net.SocketPermission.FromXml%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.SecurityElement"></xref> instance that contains an XML-encoded representation of the <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"></xref> instance, including state information.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.SecurityElement"> </xref> forekomsten som inneholder en XML-kodet gjengivelse av den <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"> </xref> forekomsten, inkludert informasjon om.

trans-unit.source: Returns the logical union between two <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"></xref> instances.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer den logiske Unionen mellom to <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"> </xref> forekomster.

trans-unit.source: The result of a call to Union is a permission that represents all of the access to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> connections represented by the current instance as well as the access represented by `target`.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet av et kall til Union er en tillatelse som representerer alle tilgang til <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>tilkoblinger som er representert av den gjeldende forekomsten, samt tilgang representert av `target`.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: Any demand that passes either the current instance or `target` passes their union.
trans-unit.target: En forespørsel som sender den gjeldende forekomsten eller `target` sender sine union.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Union%2A> and is implemented to support the <xref:System.Security.IPermission> interface.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden overstyrer <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Union%2A>og er implementert for å støtte av <xref:System.Security.IPermission>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Security.IPermission> </xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Union%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"></xref> instance to combine with the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"> </xref> forekomsten skal kombineres med den gjeldende forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"></xref> instance that represents the union of two <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"></xref> instances.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"> </xref> -forekomst som representerer sette sammen to <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"> </xref> forekomster.

trans-unit.source: If target parameter is , it returns a copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Hvis target parameteren er , returneres en kopi av den gjeldende forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: target is not a .
trans-unit.target: targetis not a .
